Vertical blinds are just a plane that is giving depth with solidfy modifier and multiplied across the window with the Array Modifier.
Settings are:



Materials setting to make the blinds translucent:
Also added cap to blinds with slightly warm color.
Disconnected Transparent node as it made the blinds too bright, but still had to leave the Mix Shader for some reason.
